subject: Re: [PATCH v6 1/1] NFSD: Enforce timeout on layout recall and integrate lease manager fencing

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Reviewer Jeff Layton raised concerns about the fencing operation, suggesting that a failure to fence a client should immediately trigger a warning and that giving up on fencing could lead to data corruption. He proposes making this tunable by allowing administrators to set a policy for what happens in case of fencing failure.
